units.name: metadata.service
units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Bare Metal Metadata Agent
[Service]
Type=oneshot
Environment=OUTPUT=/run/metadata/bootcfg
ExecStart=/usr/bin/mkdir --parent /run/metadata
ExecStart=/usr/bin/bash -c 'curl --url http://bootcfg.foo:8080/metadata?uuid=16e7d8a7-bfa9-428b-9117-363341bb330b --retry 10 --output ${OUTPUT}'
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
